languages.text: "Лорд-капитан", — {n}из вокса Паскаля вырывается хрип — не то мучительный вдох, не то помеха.{/n} — "Этот пустотный корабль мне еще плохо знаком. Среди здешних аколитов приняты свои обычаи общения с духами машин, они не знают меня и изъясняются на малопонятном диалекте {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}техна-лингвы{/g}. Я уповаю на Омниссию, чтобы мой анализ данных был верным — в таком случае у нас есть шанс умилостивить дух корабля".

"Lord Captain," {n}comes the crackle from Pasqal's vox — part beleaguered sigh, part interference.{/n} "I am still poorly acquainted with this voidship. The acolytes here have adopted their own customs for conversing with the machine spirits — they do not know me and they express themselves in a little-known dialect of {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}. I will trust in the Omnissiah that my analysis of the data was correct — it means we have a chance of appeasing the ship's spirit."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан", — {n}из вокса Паскаля вырывается хрип — не то мучительный вдох, не то помеха.{/n} — "Этот пустотный корабль мне еще плохо знаком. Среди здешних аколитов приняты свои обычаи общения с духами машин, они не знают меня и изъясняются на малопонятном диалекте {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}техна-лингвы{/g}. Я уповаю на Омниссию, чтобы мой анализ данных был верным — в таком случае у нас есть шанс умилостивить дух корабля".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain," {n}comes the crackle from Pasqal's vox — part beleaguered sigh, part interference.{/n} "This voidship is not my temple. The acolytes on this vessel have adopted their own customs for conversing with the machine spirits — they do not know me and they express themselves in a little-known dialect of {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}. I will trust in the Omnissiah that my analysis of the data was correct — it means we have a chance of appeasing the ship's spirit."

"Lord Captain," {n}comes the crackle from Pasqal's vox — part beleaguered sigh, part interference.{/n} "This voidship is not my temple. The acolytes on this vessel have adopted their own customs for conversing with the machine spirits — they do not know me and they express themselves in a little-known dialect of {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}. I will trust in the Omnissiah that my analysis of the data was correct — it means we have a chance of appeasing the ship's spirit."

"Lord Captain," {n}comes the crackle from Pasqal's vox — part beleaguered sigh, part interference.{/n} "This voidship is not my temple. The acolytes on this vessel have adopted their own customs for conversing with the machine spirits — they do not know me and they express themselves in a little-known dialect of {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}. I will trust in the Omnissiah that my analysis of the data was correct — it means we have a chance of appeasing the ship's spirit."

"Lord Captain," {n}comes the crackle from Pasqal's vox — part beleaguered sigh, part interference.{/n} "I am still poorly acquainted with this voidship. The acolytes here have adopted their own customs for conversing with the machine spirits — they do not know me and they express themselves in a little-known dialect of {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}. I will trust in the Omnissiah that my analysis of the data was correct — it means we have a chance of appeasing the ship's spirit."

"Lord Captain," {n}comes the crackle from Pasqal's vox — part beleaguered sigh, part interference.{/n} "I am still poorly acquainted with this voidship. The acolytes here have adopted their own customs for conversing with the machine spirits — they do not know me and they express themselves in a little-known dialect of {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}. I will trust in the Omnissiah that my analysis of the data was correct — it means we have a chance of appeasing the ship's spirit."

languages.text: “舰长大人。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵系统中传来了噼里啪啦的声音，一部分是困顿的叹息，一部分是干扰。{/n}“我对这艘虚空舰还不是特别熟悉，船上的侍仆们也有着他们自己的方式与习俗来与机魂交流。那些机魂并不认识我，而且它们在用一种鲜为人知的{g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}科技之语{/g}进行表达。我愿意相信欧姆尼塞亚，相信我对数据的分析是正确的。这意味着，我们说不定可以顺利安抚这艘船的机魂。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain," {n}comes the crackle from Pasqal's vox — part beleaguered sigh, part interference.{/n} "I am still poorly acquainted with this voidship. The acolytes here have adopted their own customs for conversing with the machine spirits — they do not know me and they express themselves in a little-known dialect of {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}. I will trust in the Omnissiah that my analysis of the data was correct — it means we have a chance of appeasing the ship's spirit."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵系统中传来了噼里啪啦的声音，一部分是困顿的叹息，一部分是干扰。{/n}“这艘虚空舰并不是我的神殿，船上的侍仆们也有着他们自己的方式与习俗来与机魂交流。那些机魂并不认识我，而且它们在用一种鲜为人知的{g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}科技之语{/g}进行表达。我愿意相信欧姆尼塞亚，相信我对数据的分析是正确的。这意味着，我们说不定可以顺利安抚这艘船的机魂。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}パスカルのヴォクスからパチパチと音が聞こえてくる。その一部は苦悩のため息、その一部は通信障害だ。{/n}「自分は、まだこのヴォイドシップのことをよく理解できていません。この船のアコライトは、機械精霊と会話するための独自の習慣を採用しています。彼らは自分を知らず、あまり知られていない{g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}テクナ・リングア{/g}の方言で会話を行います。自分は、自分のデータ分析が正しかったことを万機神の名のもとに信じています。つまり、この船の精霊を鎮める機会があるということです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain," {n}comes the crackle from Pasqal's vox — part beleaguered sigh, part interference.{/n} "I am still poorly acquainted with this voidship. The acolytes here have adopted their own customs for conversing with the machine spirits — they do not know me and they express themselves in a little-known dialect of {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}. I will trust in the Omnissiah that my analysis of the data was correct — it means we have a chance of appeasing the ship's spirit."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、」{n}パスカルのヴォクスからパチパチと音が聞こえてくる。その一部は苦悩のため息、その一部は通信障害だ。{/n}「私は、まだこのヴォイドシップのことをよく知れていません。この船のアコライトは、機械精霊と会話するための独自の習慣を採用しています。彼らは私を知らず、あまり知られていない{g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}テクナ・リングア{/g}の方言で会話を行います。私は、私のデータ分析が正しかったことを万機神の名のもとに信じております。つまり、この船の精霊を鎮めるチャンスがあるということです」

「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}パスカルのヴォクスからパチパチと音が聞こえてくる。その一部は苦悩のため息、その一部は通信障害だ。{/n}「自分は、まだこのヴォイドシップのことをよく理解できていません。この船のアコライトは、機械精霊と会話するための独自の習慣を採用しています。彼らは自分を知らず、あまり知られていない{g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}テクナ・リングア{/g}の方言で会話を行います。自分は、自分のデータ分析が正しかったことを万機神の名のもとに信じています。つまり、この船の精霊を鎮める機会があるということです」

languages.text: "Lord Captain", {n}knistert es aus Pasqals Vox – teils Seufzen, teils Interferenz.{/n} "Ich habe mich immer noch nicht an dieses Raumschiff gewöhnt. Die Akolythen hier haben ihre eigenen Bräuche im Umgang mit den Maschinengeistern entwickelt – sie kennen mich nicht, und sie benutzen einen wenig bekannten Dialekt der {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua technis{/g}. Ich vertraue auf den Omnissiah und die Korrektheit meiner Datenanalyse – wir haben eine Chance, den Geist des Schiffs zu besänftigen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain," {n}comes the crackle from Pasqal's vox — part beleaguered sigh, part interference.{/n} "I am still poorly acquainted with this voidship. The acolytes here have adopted their own customs for conversing with the machine spirits — they do not know me and they express themselves in a little-known dialect of {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}. I will trust in the Omnissiah that my analysis of the data was correct — it means we have a chance of appeasing the ship's spirit."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain", {n}knistert es aus Pasqals Vox – teils Seufzen, teils Interferenz.{/n} "Dieses Raumschiff ist nicht mein Tempel. Die Akolythen hier haben ihre eigenen Bräuche im Umgang mit den Maschinengeistern entwickelt – sie kennen mich nicht, und sie benutzen einen wenig bekannten Dialekt der {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua technis{/g}. Ich vertraue auf den Omnissiah und die Korrektheit meiner Datenanalyse – wir haben eine Chance, den Geist des Schiffs zu besänftigen."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, » {n}poursuit Pasqal dans un grésillement de vox teinté de soupir.{/n} « Ce vaisseau est encore tout nouveau pour moi. Les acolytes présents à son bord ont adopté leurs propres usages pour converser avec les esprits de la machine. Ils ne me connaissent pas et s'expriment dans un dialecte peu usité du {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}. Je place ma confiance en l'Omnimessie pour que mes analyses soient correctes... et cela signifie que nous avons une chance d'apaiser l'esprit de ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain," {n}comes the crackle from Pasqal's vox — part beleaguered sigh, part interference.{/n} "I am still poorly acquainted with this voidship. The acolytes here have adopted their own customs for conversing with the machine spirits — they do not know me and they express themselves in a little-known dialect of {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}. I will trust in the Omnissiah that my analysis of the data was correct — it means we have a chance of appeasing the ship's spirit."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, » {n}poursuit Pasqal dans un grésillement de vox teinté de soupir.{/n} « Ce vaisseau spatial n'est pas mon temple. Les acolytes du navire ont adopté leurs propres usages pour converser avec les esprits de la machine. Ils ne me connaissent pas, et s'expriment dans un dialecte peu usité du {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}. Je place ma confiance en l'Omnimessie pour que mes analyses soient correctes... et cela signifie que nous avons une chance d'apaiser l'esprit de ce vaisseau. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán». {n}El voco de Pasqal responde con un chisporroteo que mezcla suspiro e interferencias.{/n} «Todavía no conozco bien esta nave del vacío. Los acólitos de a bordo han adoptado sus propias costumbres para conversar con los espíritus máquina, que no me conocen y se expresan en un dialecto poco común de la {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}tecnolingua{/g}. Confiaré en el Omnissiah para que mi análisis de los datos haya sido correcto, porque, de ser así, tenemos una posibilidad de apaciguar al espíritu de la nave».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain," {n}comes the crackle from Pasqal's vox — part beleaguered sigh, part interference.{/n} "I am still poorly acquainted with this voidship. The acolytes here have adopted their own customs for conversing with the machine spirits — they do not know me and they express themselves in a little-known dialect of {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}. I will trust in the Omnissiah that my analysis of the data was correct — it means we have a chance of appeasing the ship's spirit."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán». {n}El voco de Pasqal responde con un suspiro atribulado e interferencias.{/n} «Esta nave del vacío no es mi templo. Los acólitos de a bordo han adoptado sus propias costumbres para conversar con los espíritus máquina, que no me conocen y se expresan en un dialecto poco común de la {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}tecnolingua{/g}. Confiaré en el Omnissiah para que mi análisis de los datos haya sido correcto, porque, de ser así, tenemos una posibilidad de apaciguar al espíritu de la nave».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan sıkıntılı bir iç çekiş ile parazitlenme arası bir çatırtı geliyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, bu uçsuz gemisine aşinalığım hâlâ zayıf. Buradaki havariler, makine ruhlarıyla iletişim kurma konusunda kendilerine has usuller benimsemişler. Beni tanımıyorlar ve kendilerini {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua Techna'nın{/g} az bilinen bir diyalektiyle ifade ediyorlar. Hermesih'in de takdiriyle veri analizim doğruysa geminin ruhunu yatıştırma şansımız olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain," {n}comes the crackle from Pasqal's vox — part beleaguered sigh, part interference.{/n} "I am still poorly acquainted with this voidship. The acolytes here have adopted their own customs for conversing with the machine spirits — they do not know me and they express themselves in a little-known dialect of {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Techna-Lingua{/g}. I will trust in the Omnissiah that my analysis of the data was correct — it means we have a chance of appeasing the ship's spirit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal voksundan sıkıntılı bir iç çekiş ve parazitlenme eşliğinde konuşuyor:{/n} "Lord Kaptan, bu uçsuz gemisini hâlâ yakından tanıyabilmiş değilim. Buradaki havariler, makine ruhlarıyla iletişim kurmak konusunda kendilerine has bir yöntem geliştirmişler. Beni tanımıyorlar ve kendilerini {g|Encyclopedia:LinguaTechnis}Lingua Techna{/g}'nın az bilinen bir diyalektiyle ifade ediyorlar. Hermesih veri analizimi doğru kıldıysa geminin ruhunu yatıştırma şansımız olabilir."
